TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class ClientBuildManager : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ClientBuildManager extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class ClientBuildManager Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements IDisposable
public ref class ClientBuildManager sealed : MarshalByRefObject, IDisposable
type ClientBuildManager = class inherit MarshalByRefObject interface IDisposable

summary.span: 为 ASP.NET 应用程序提供编译服务。

span.span: Provides compilation services for ASP.NET applications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供用于编译 ASP.NET Web 应用程序、检索生成的程序集或生成的源代码的方法和属性。The class offers methods and properties for compiling ASP.NET Web applications, and retrieving the generated assemblies or generated source code. 类的实例在客户端的应用程序域中建立，并提供对 Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS) 之外的 ASP.NET 生成系统的访问权限。Instances of the class are established in the client's application domain and provide access to the ASP.NET build system outside of Microsoft Internet Information Services (IIS). 类可用于开发自定义用于编译 Web 应用程序的工具。The class can be used to develop customized tools for compiling Web applications. 命令行工具 `aspnet_compiler` 使用 类。The command-line tool `aspnet_compiler` uses the class.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Site Precompilation

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
ASP.NET Web Site Precompilation

summary.span: 编译与应用程序相关的文件，例如，App_Code 目录中的文件、Global.asax 文件、资源文件和 Web 引用。

span.span: Compiles application-dependent files, such as files in the App_Code directory, the Global.asax file, resource files, and Web references.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法确保编译了 App_Browsers 目录中的资源、Web 引用、App_Code 目录中的文件和 global.asax 文件。The method ensures that resources, Web references, files in the App_Code directory, .browser files in the App_Browsers directory, and the Global.asax file are compiled.

A for the given file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索编译文件所需的信息。The method retrieves information needed to compile a file. 除了 作为返回值的对象之外，它还返回三个 `out` 参数。In addition to a object as a return value, it returns three `out` parameters. `codeDomProviderType`参数返回生成和编译文件的提供程序类型。The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the file. `compilerParameters`参数包含的属性用于确定编译行为。The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior. `linePragmasTable`参数包含行杂注的字典。The `linePragmasTable` parameter contains a dictionary of line pragmas.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Site Precompilation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string[] GetAppDomainShutdownDirectories() cil managed

summary.span: 获取包含特定文件的目录，这些文件如果更改，会导致应用程序域关闭。

span.span: Gets the directories with files that, when changed, cause the application domain to shut down.

returns.span: 包含顶级目录名称的 数组。

span.span: A array containing the top-level directory names.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对特定顶层目录中的文件所做的更改会导致应用程序域关闭。Changes to files in specific top-level directories cause the application domain to shut down. 将监视 Bin、App_Code、Global_Resources、Web 引用和 App_Browsers 目录中的文件，以检测任何更改。Files within the Bin, App_Code, Global_Resources, Web References, and App_Browsers directories are monitored to detect any changes. 当检测到更改时，应用程序域将关闭。When changes are detected, the application domain is shut down.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Site Precompilation

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Collections.IDictionary GetBrowserDefinitions() cil managed

summary.span: 获取浏览器元素的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of browser elements.
An containing browser elements.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象包含值的键和对象的浏览器名称 。The object contains browser names for the keys and objects for the values. 每个对象都包含父浏览器元素的名称、描述和树中浏览器元素的深度。The objects each contain the name of the parent browser element, a description, and the depth of the browser element in the tree.

param.name: virtualCodeDir
param.span: 要检索其相关信息的目录。

span.span: The directory about which to retrieve information.

param.name: codeDomProviderType
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含用于代码生成和编译的提供程序类型。

span.span: When this method returns, contains the provider type used for code generation and compilation.

span.span: When this method returns, contains the directory for files generated from non-code files.

summary.span: 获取与编译器类型、编译器参数以及用来存储根据非代码文件（如 .wsdl 文件）生成的代码文件的目录有关的信息。

span.span: Gets information about the compiler type, compiler parameters, and the directory in which to store code files generated from non-code files such as .wsdl files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法检索生成代码目录所需的信息。The method retrieves information needed to build a code directory. 它通过三个参数返回此信息 `out` 。It returns this information through three `out` parameters. `codeDomProviderType`参数返回用于生成和编译代码目录中的文件的提供程序类型。The `codeDomProviderType` parameter returns the provider type for generating and compiling the files in the code directory. `compilerParameters`参数包含的属性用于确定编译行为。The `compilerParameters` parameter contains properties that determine compilation behavior. `generatedFilesDir`参数存储目录路径，其中包含从代码目录（如 .wsdl 文件）中的非代码文件生成的所有代码文件。The `generatedFilesDir` parameter stores the directory path containing all the code files generated from non-code files in the code directory, such as .wsdl files.

span.span: is null.

summary.span: 通过防止创建租约来给予应用程序域无限生存期。

span.span: Gives the application domain an infinite lifetime by preventing a lease from being created.
Always .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法会重写 其基类中的方法。This method overrides the method in its base class. 它始终返回 `null` ，从而防止创建将限制应用程序域生存期的租约。It always returns `null` and thereby prevents a lease from being created that would limit the application domain's lifetime.

ASP.NET Web Site Precompilation

summary.span: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一个窗体允许 ASP.NET 应用程序的就地预编译。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在此窗体中，站点部署到生产环境中，然后进行预编译，这样就无需在用户第一次访问站点时动态编译站点。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 站点的第一个用户不会遇到在动态编译的站点上通常会遇到的延迟。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. 另外两种形式的预编译用于部署。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一窗体中，都会生成可以部署到生产计算机的站点布局。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一种形式不包含标记页，因此无法在不重新编译原始站点的情况下进行更新。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 对于这两种形式的预编译，都不会将源代码部署到目标环境。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 用于预编译的应用程序是通过 构造函数定义的。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 构造函数的对象 定义要执行三种形式的预编译中的哪一种。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 开发人员可以使用 `aspnet_compiler` 命令行工具或通过调用方法来预编译网站 。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Site Precompilation

summary.span: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一个窗体允许 ASP.NET 应用程序的就地预编译。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在此窗体中，站点部署到生产环境中，然后进行预编译，这样就无需在用户第一次访问站点时动态编译站点。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 站点的第一个用户不会遇到在动态编译的站点上通常会遇到的延迟。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. 另外两种形式的预编译用于部署。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一窗体中，都会生成可以部署到生产计算机的站点布局。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一种形式不包含标记页，因此无法在不重新编译原始站点的情况下进行更新。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 对于这两种形式的预编译，都不会将源代码部署到目标环境。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 用于预编译的应用程序是通过 构造函数定义的。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 构造函数的对象 定义要执行三种形式的预编译中的哪一种。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 开发人员可以使用 `aspnet_compiler` 命令行工具或通过调用方法来预编译网站 。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application and provides a callback method to receive status information about the build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一个窗体允许 ASP.NET 应用程序的就地预编译。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在此窗体中，站点部署到生产环境中，然后进行预编译，这样就无需在用户第一次访问站点时动态编译站点。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 站点的第一个用户不会遇到在动态编译的站点上通常会遇到的延迟。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. `callback`参数包含报告编译结果时要调用的方法。The `callback` parameter contains the method to call when reporting the result of compilation. 另外两种形式的预编译用于部署。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一窗体中，都会生成可以部署到生产计算机的站点布局。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一种形式不包含标记页，因此无法在不重新编译原始站点的情况下进行更新。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 对于这两种形式的预编译，都不会将源代码部署到目标环境。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 用于预编译的应用程序是通过 构造函数定义的。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 构造函数的对象 定义要执行三种形式的预编译中的哪一种。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 开发人员可以使用 `aspnet_compiler` 命令行工具或通过调用方法来预编译网站 。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public void PrecompileApplication (System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback callback, bool forceCleanBuild);
.method public hidebysig instance void PrecompileApplication(class System.Web.Compilation.ClientBuildManagerCallback callback, bool forceCleanBuild) cil managed
Public Sub PrecompileApplication (callback As ClientBuildManagerCallback, forceCleanBuild As Boolean)

param.name: callback
param.span: 包含报告编译结果时要调用的方法的 。

span.span: A containing the method to call when reporting the result of compilation.

param.name: forceCleanBuild
param.span: 执行干净生成，这将首先删除所有对象和中间文件； 则仅重新生成那些已更改的文件。

span.span: to perform a clean build, which will first delete all object and intermediate files; to rebuild only those files that have changed.

param.span: 如果存在生成环境可能不选取依赖项的可能性，则设置为 true。

span.span: Set to true if there is a chance that a dependency might not be picked up by the build environment.

summary.span: 预编译 ASP.NET 应用程序，提供回调方法以接收有关生成的状态信息，并指示是否创建干净生成。

span.span: Precompiles an ASP.NET application, provides a callback method to receive status information about the build, and indicates whether to create a clean build.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 支持三种形式的预编译。ASP.NET supports three forms of precompilation. 一个窗体允许 ASP.NET 应用程序的就地预编译。One form allows for the in-place precompilation of an ASP.NET application. 在此窗体中，站点部署到生产环境中，然后进行预编译，这样就无需在用户第一次访问站点时动态编译站点。In this form, the site is deployed to production and then precompiled, which eliminates the need to dynamically compile the site when it is first visited by a user. 站点的第一个用户不会遇到在动态编译的站点上通常会遇到的延迟。The first user of the site will not experience the delay normally encountered on a site that is dynamically compiled. `callback`参数包含报告编译结果时要调用的方法。The `callback` parameter contains the method to call when reporting the result of compilation. 另外两种形式的预编译用于部署。The two other forms of precompilation are used for deployment. 在任一窗体中，都会生成可以部署到生产计算机的站点布局。In either form, a layout of the site is generated that can be deployed to a production computer. 其中一种形式包括标记页，因此可以在编译的站点上执行一定量的更新。One of these forms includes the markup pages so some amount of updating can be performed on the compiled site. 另一种形式不包含标记页，因此无法在不重新编译原始站点的情况下进行更新。The other form does not contain the markup pages and therefore cannot be updated without recompiling the original site. 对于这两种形式的预编译，都不会将源代码部署到目标环境。No source code is deployed to the target environment in either of these forms of precompilation. 用于预编译的应用程序是通过 构造函数定义的。The application to precompile is defined through the constructor. 构造函数的对象 定义要执行三种形式的预编译中的哪一种。The object of the constructor defines which of the three forms of precompilation to perform. 开发人员可以使用 `aspnet_compiler` 命令行工具或通过调用方法来预编译网站 。A developer can precompile a Web site with the `aspnet_compiler` command-line tool or by calling the method.
